name: Cutlass
description: The Cutlass is a sword obtainable at the Sword Dealer at Marine Starter or Pirate Starter.

attacks.name: Quiet Rush
attacks.description: The user dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies in the way.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.description: A slash that goes through the air and deals damage and knocks back every enemy in its path.

name: Katana
description: The Katana is a sword obtainable at the Sword Dealer at Marine Starter or Pirate Starter.

attacks.name: Quiet Rush
attacks.description: The user dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies in the way.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.description: A slash that goes through the air and deals damage and knocks back every enemy in its path.

name: Saw
description: Saw is a boss that appears every 1h15 in the First Sea.
